Police Shootings in Minnesota, 2004-2016

Pixabay via Pexels

 Originally published by Saint Paul Pioneer Press at https://www.twincities.com/2015/11/17/police-shooting-in-minnesota-2004-present/   [Archived] 

 Reason for republication:  Degraded Assets 

By Dan Bauman
Date: November 17, 2015

A Pioneer Press analysis found four fatal police shootings in the past decade that were not recorded in the Minnesota Bureau of Criminal Apprehension database as “fatalities.” In fact, no record exists in the database of any shots fired for at least three of those cases. The Pioneer Press has created its own tally of police-related shootings from 2004 to April 2016.
